short_effect.2: Has double power if $target has a major status ailment.
short_effect.3: Doubles in power with each consecutive successful use.
short_effect.5: Power rises the faster the user is compared to $target.
short_effect.6: Power rises the slower the user is compared to $target.
short_effect.7: Has double power if $target has already taken damage this turn.
short_effect.8: Inflicts damage based on $target's Attack stat instead of the user's.
short_effect.9: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.14: Hits 2 to 5 times in one turn.
short_effect.15: Hits 4 to 5 times in one turn.
short_effect.16: Digs underground and hits at the beginning of the next turn.
short_effect.17: Lifts $target into the sky and hits at the beginning of the next turn.
short_effect.18: Hits $target at the beginning of the turn after next.
short_effect.19: User moves back one tile, switching places with any Pokémon already there.
short_effect.20: Switches $target with the Pokémon behind it.
short_effect.21: Heals the user by half the damage dealt.
short_effect.23: Cannot be used the turn after hitting.
short_effect.25: Lowers the user's range and Defense until its next turn.
short_effect.26: Damages the user if it misses.
short_effect.28: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Attack.
short_effect.30: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's Defense.
short_effect.33: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's Speed.
short_effect.36: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's accuracy.
short_effect.40: Has a $effect_chance% chance to badly poison $target.
short_effect.44: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make $target flinch.
short_effect.47: Permanently destroys $target's item if it is consumable.
short_effect.48: Has double power against Pokémon with less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.49: Has double power against poisoned Pokémon.
short_effect.51: Uses $target's item if it is consumable.
short_effect.58: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's range by one tile.
short_effect.59: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense.
short_effect.60: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.61: Has a $effect_chance% chance each to burn $target or make it flinch.
short_effect.62: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn $target.  Thaws the user out if frozen.
short_effect.63: Lowers the user's range and Defense until its next turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze $target.
short_effect.64: Hits 2 to 3 times in one turn.  User has 0 range on its next turn.
short_effect.65: Has double power and wakes $target up if it is asleep.
short_effect.66: Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison $target and an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.67: Heals the user by half the damage inflicted.  Only works if $target is asleep.
short_effect.68: Hits twice in one turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison $target with each hit.

effect.1: Inflicts exactly 40 HP in damage, unaffected by stats or types.
effect.2: Inflicts regular damage.  Has double power if $target has a major status ailment.
effect.3: Inflicts regular damage.  Every time this move succeeds, its power doubles; if it fails or is not used for a turn, it resets.
effect.5: Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to $target's, the more power this move has.
effect.6: Inflicts regular damage.  The lower the user's Speed compared to $target's, the more power this move has.
effect.7: Inflicts regular damage.  Has double power if $target has already taken damage this turn.
effect.8: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using $target's Attack stat rather than the user's.
effect.9: Inflicts regular damage.  This move's critical hit rate is higher than usual.
effect.14: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits two to five times in one turn, with damage calculated separately each time.
effect.15: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits four to five times in one turn, with damage calculated separately each time.
effect.16: Inflicts regular damage.  The user digs underground, dodging all moves until it attacks.  At the beginning of the next turn, the user hits $target, even if $target has moved, and cannot move again that turn.
effect.17: Inflicts regular damage.  The user carries $target into the sky.  No moves can hit either Pokémon in this state.  At the beginning of the next turn, the user slams $target to the ground, inflicting regular damage.  The user cannot move again that turn.
effect.18:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits $target at the beginning of the user's turn two turns after this one, even if the target has moved.

In the turn in-between, the user can use this move again, but it will miss any target that already has a Future Sight pending.
effect.21: Inflicts regular damage.  The user heals for half as many HP as it dealt in damage.
effect.22: The user teleports randomly to another tile.
effect.23: Inflicts regular damage.  If the move succeeds, it cannot be used again on the next turn.
effect.25: Inflicts regular damage.  The user's Defense is lowered and its range is lowered to one tile until the beginning of its next turn.
effect.26: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move misses, the user takes some damage.
effect.28: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Attack afterward.
effect.29: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Attack afterward.
effect.30: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's Defense afterward.
effect.33: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's Speed afterward.
effect.36: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's accuracy.
effect.37: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze $target.
effect.39: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison $target.
effect.40: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to badly poison $target.
effect.41: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn $target.
effect.42: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze $target.
effect.43: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse $target.
effect.44: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make $target flinch.
effect.47: Inflicts regular damage.  Permanently destroys $target's item if the item can be consumed in battle.
effect.48: Inflicts regular damage.  Has double power when calculating damage against a target with less than half its max HP remaining, on a target-by-target basis.
effect.49: Inflicts regular damage.  Has double power when calculating damage against a poisoned target, on a target-by-target basis.
effect.51: Inflicts regular damage.  The user steals $target's item, if the item can be consumed in battle, and uses it on itself, or destroys it if it would have no effect.
effect.52:
Inflicts regular damage.  Always has 100% accuracy.

This move still misses Pokémon under the effects of []{move:dig} or []{move:sky-drop} and can still be dodged by abilities such as []{ability:instinct}.
effect.58: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower $target's range by one tile.
effect.59: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Attack and Defense afterward.
effect.61: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn $target, and a $effect_chance% chance, separately rolled, to make $target flinch.
effect.62: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn $target.  Can be used if the user is frozen, in which case it thaws out.
effect.63: Inflicts regular damage.  The user's Defense is lowered and its range is lowered to one tile until the beginning of its next turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze $target.
effect.64: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits two to three times in one turn, with damage calculated separately for each hit.  The user's range is lowered to 0 on its next turn.
effect.65: Inflicts regular damage.  If $target is asleep, this move has double power and wakes $target up.
effect.66: Inflicts damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison $target.  This move's critical hit rate is higher than usual.
effect.67: Inflicts damage if $target is asleep, and fails otherwise.  Heals the user for half as many HP as it dealt in damage.
effect.68: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison $target with each hit.
